Elements.Name: timeBonusAlgorithm
Description: The Lua equation that calculates the time bonus.
Exposed variables:
• totalRingCount - total number of rings obtained throughout the stage.
• totalVelocity - total velocity built up throughout the stage when passing checkpoints.
• ringCount - number of rings the player finished with.
• minutes - minutes on the timer.
• seconds - seconds on the timer.
• elapsedTime - total amount of time passed in seconds.
• score - total score the player finished with.
• scoreLimit - the maximum amount of score the player can obtain.
• secondsForA - elapsed time in seconds the player must finish with for rank A.
• secondsForC - elapsed time in seconds the player must finish with for rank C.
Set this to '0' to disable it.

Elements.Name: scoreFormat
Description: The string format used to display the score on the HUD.
Examples:
%d - write the raw value.
%06d - write the value with six digit padding.
